Just then a shuttle appears above Earth containing THE
REFORMATTED OPTIMUS PRIMAL! It goes down towards
Eastern Asia.

OOC: I will not acknowledge BM, but I will acknoledge
that OP started a small movement.

--- Vincent Price <thecode@...> wrote:
> OOC: Okay, Dewboy, I never want to speak to you
> again, because it's obvious that you lack a brain
> and proper etiquette. And I KNOW Optimus was
> reformatted, it happened in Beast Machines, but in
> THIS RPG, Beast Machines never happened, how many
> times do you need to be told that?...
> 
> BIC: A single stasis pod drops to Earth.
> 
> OOC: What? Thought I'd bail out on the RPG? That
> would be like a rat (I was a rat) leaving a sinking
> ship! (This RPG was a sinking ship. But now, I plan
> to do all I can to help. So, here he is, first team
> to collect my new bot, well, gets him, simple. Just
> make the subject be something I can recognize, just
> in case I mistake it for another pod. Okay? OKAY!
> 
> BIC: The pod doesn't scan, because this was not an
> Axalon Pod. The pod was from Cybertron, and
> Cybertron was not organic! Incredible!...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Kyle Stewart 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Tuesday, November 27, 2001 9:47 PM
>   Subject: Re: Optimus Fury
>

>   PRIMAL WAS REFORMATTED, BUT NEVER ACTUALLY DID

>   AFTER THAT EXCEPT STARTING A VERY MINOR RELIGION
> NOW
>   KNOWN AS THE MALACONS! DO I NEED TO BRING HIM TO
>   EARTH!
